PosterMessage:
Heading <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> to take out a monster
fort uncovered there. -Captain Flaxel,
Monster-Control Crew, Squad Three
Talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>As long as the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff> keeps coming
back, we'll have to keep fighting.

I just wish we were as powerful as you
are.<sp:5:0:0> I know that's too much to hope for,<sp:5:0:0>
but still, we've got to get stronger.
Of course, push yourself too hard and you
do more harm than good.<sp:5:1:0> That goes for
you too. Go easy on yourself, OK?
Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Incredible!<sp:5:0:0> I can't believe how tough you
are!<sp:5:1:0> There wasn't even a lick of fighting
left for us to do!
Talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>If you're good enough to be Princess
Zelda's personal knight, I guess this
kinda thing is a piece of cake for you.
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If it isn't Link! I had a feeling you'd come!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>As you can see, the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff> has
brought back the monsters good as new.<sp:5:0:0>
Or maybe I should say BAD as new.
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>We're raring to go beat up the monsters
that set up that big ol' fort.
Talk1047:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Think_01>But the <clr:0000>iron ball<clr:ffff> at the entrance is in the
way, and we're not sure what to do.

We can't go charging up there without a
plan, or that ball is sure to take us out.
Talk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, if it isn't Link! I had a feeling we'd
meet again!
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Get up, you lot!<sp:5:0:0> We won!<sp:5:1:0> Come on,
gather round, everyone!
Talk1048:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Shitauchi>Oh and it isn't just the monsters that have
come backâ€”that <clr:0000>iron ball<clr:ffff> is back too.
Talk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_01>I'd have us charge that fort right now if I
could. But first we've gotta do something
about that ball at the entrance.
If we could <clr:0000>get rid of it<clr:ffff>, nothing would
stop us from giving those monsters the
thrashing they deserve.
Talk1025:
<snd:Notice_00>Link!<sp:5:1:0> I didn't expect you to come all
the way out here!

I know it's cold and all, but I've got to
give you a reward.<sp:5:0:0> Can you spare
a minute?
Talk_014:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Trouble>Hey, c'mon... <sp:5:1:0>Everyone's real stressed
out right now.<sp:5:1:0> So don't go pestering
anyone, OK?
Talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_00>Wow, you amaze me yet again!<sp:5:1:0> Seriously,<sp:5:0:0>
you must be what they call a prodigy
or something.
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_00>Wow, you amaze me yet again!<sp:5:1:0> There we
were, no idea what to do...

Then you come swooping in and wipe
out every last monster all by yourself!
Talk_015:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>We're just about to go take out the 
monsters that set up that fort.

There's nothing stopping us now. Time to
hit 'em with all we've got!
Talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_00>Wow,<sp:5:0:0> you just jumped in there and helped
us out without saying a word. Modest as
always, I see.
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We're gonna rest up a bit and get ready
for the next battle.

That <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I tell ya, no matter how many monsters
we defeat,<sp:5:0:0> it makes sure we get knocked
right back to square one.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>Anyway, if we don't get some rest, those
monsters will defeat us for sure,<sp:5:0:0> and all
our hard work won't mean a thing.
Push yourself too hard and you become
your own worst enemy, ya know?<sp:5:0:0> Same
goes for you. Go easy on yourself, OK?
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>As usual, I'm in awe of that incredible
strength of yours.
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL><sp:1:3:4:6e000000>May the Goddess Hylia keep you safe,
brave warrior.
Talk1005:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseS_01>Whoa! <sp:5:0:0>The path is clear!


<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>This is it, everyone! <sp:5:0:0>Charge!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1053:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>We were on our way to beat up the
monsters that set up that big ol' fort.

But then we got here and found it
totally deserted.
Talk1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Oh yeah, I almost forgot. I got word
from headquarters.<sp:0:4:0>Apparently we're not the only monster-
control-crew squad you've helped out.<sp:0:4:0>So HQ asked me to give you this thank-
you gift. Hope it adds a bit of excitement
to your journey.
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:CallFar_00>We did it! <sp:5:0:0>We won!<sp:5:1:0> Come on, gather
round, everyone!
Near1003: That iron ball is in the way.
Talk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Shitauchi_00>I can't believe we have to just sit here
on the sidelines! There has to be a way
to get rid of that blasted <clr:0000>iron ball<clr:ffff>!
Talk1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Here, take this as a reward for all
your help.
Talk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble>I just wish we could <clr:0000>get rid of the iron ball<clr:ffff>
somehow, then we'd really give those
monsters a beating.
